metadata.title: USN-6674-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: Seokchan Yoon discovered that the Django Truncator function incorrectly handled very long HTML input. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Django to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6674-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.11 python-django-doc - 2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.11 No subscription required
